name: Time
description: Animation originally made in 2005 but updated in 2009, 2014 and 2017. It uses the computer clock to build the animated display of hours, minutes and seconds of the day.This videosequence are the 30 seconds before 8pm. The 2017 version was installed during 1 year in a waiting room of the UZ hospital in Jette, Belgium. 2005 CR 538 https://hansup.be/2005_time_animation_hans-verhaegen.html
